Name: S&M: FL
About the game: Welcome to join the group, where you can discuss the game with many players and give feedback about the game in the group. QQ group: 224145331 Players need to roll dice on the board to advance, and to reach certain points they need to fight. Imagine running into an enemy stronghold all by yourself, trying to kill them all in one second. It doesn't exist! The first thing you do is defend, and then you find the time to attack. Of course, you can also attack first, but there is a risk involved. Planning your resources and figuring out the optimal way to roll dice and fight is the key to your success! Main Features: In combat, players can make use of the Shield counter mechanic and use different skills to fight enemies. Shield counter is when you look at the right moment to block an enemy's attack and use it to trigger skills.
